title: If You Dare to Marry Me, Then I Do Too - Novel Updates
author: Xīn Luò   忻珞
description: Two people in love, who went from being friends to lovers in just one week, walked hand in hand to the marriage hall and led a humorous newly married life. Perhaps, in this age where materialism is more important than love, what we need is a kind of plain and simple romance, that was always there to begin with, but had just been inadvertently ignored…>
